mighty-bison.name: Mighty Bison
mighty-bison.description: Mighty Bison is a Generation 4 Pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 190 days old, give or take.

skill.title: Fearless Roar
skill.description: The primeval roar of the bison ignites the self-assurance of your soldiers, increasing Squad Capacity by 15,000 for 2 hours. (Cooldown: 20 hours)

giant-rhino.name: Giant Rhino
giant-rhino.description: Giant Rhino is a Generation 4 Pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 190 days old, give or take.

skill.title: Wild Charge
skill.description: The Giant Rhino launches a wild rampage against the enemy’s brittle lines, increasing all Squads’ Attack by `10.00%` for 2 hours. (Cooldown: 20 hours)

grizzly-bear.name: Grizzly Bear
grizzly-bear.description: Grizzly Bear is a Generation 3 Pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 110 days old, give or take.

skill.title: The Howler
skill.description: Every hunter trembles at the charging howl of the Grizzly Bear. Increases March Speed by `30.00%` and reduces enemy squads’ Lethality by `5.00%` for 2h. (Cooldown: 20h)

lion.name: Lion
lion.description: The Lion is a Generation 3 Pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 110 days old, give or take..

skill.title: Gift of the King
skill.description: All animals show special deference to the King of the Jungle. Unearths an item lost on the Badland. (Cooldown: `23h`)

moose.name: Moose
moose.description: Moose is a Generation 2 pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 80 days old. Its “Horror Stare” skill is a battle ability that lowers enemy squad health in every battle you fight for the next two hours after activating it.

skill.title: Horror Stare
skill.description: The giant Moose stares the enemy before charging, reducing enemy Squad’s Health by `5.00%` for 2h. (Cooldown: 20h)

cheetah.name: Cheetah
cheetah.description: Cheetah is a Generation 2 pet in Kingshot that becomes available when your state is around 80 days old. You can level him up to 70, and his skill gives you free pet food every 23 hours.

skill.title: Scent Mastery
skill.description: As a natural predator, its keen sense of smell allows it to instantly locate `500` pet food. (Cooldown: 23h)

bison.name: Bison
bison.description: The Bison is a Gen 1 pet in Kingshot that usually unlocks around day 55 of the server. He can reach level 60, and his skill instantly finishes gathering on your next resource tile. As you level him up, the skill’s cooldown gets shorter—from 1 day and 11 hours at the start to just 15 hours at max level.

skill.title: Grip of the Titan
skill.description: Harnessing your pet’s formidable strength and endurance, instantly complete the gathering upon reaching the next wilderness resource tile. (Cooldown: `15h`)

lynx.name: Lynx
lynx.description: The Lynx is a Gen 1 pet in Kingshot that usually becomes available around day 55 of the server. She can level up to 60, and her skill restores stamina by 35 to 60, depending on the advancement level.

skill.title: Comforting Embrace
skill.description: Felines of all stripes have the ability to soothe a Governor’s mind, immediately restoring `60` Stamina. (Cooldown: 23h)

gray-wolf.name: Gray Wolf
gray-wolf.description: The Gray Wolf is a Gen 1 pet in Kingshot that usually becomes available around day 55 of the server. He can level up to 50, and his skill boosts your construction speed by 5% to 15%, depending on the advancement level.

skill.title: Construction Aide
skill.description: The wolf silently yet cleverly delivers tools to the yard, increasing Construction Speed by `15.00%` for 5 minutes. (Cooldown: 23h)
